<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>x_58872_needit.CountRecords</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>To count the records of urgency. </description> <name>CountRecords</name> <script><![CDATA[var CountRecords = Class.create(); CountRecords.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
getRecord1Count:function(){
var urgencyQuery = new GlideRecord('incident'); urgencyQuery.addQuery('urgency', 1); urgencyQuery.query(); return urgencyQuery.getRowCount();
},
type: 'CountRecords' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-02-05 07:24:14</sys_created_on> <sys_id>29ec0a4f2fc22010fdd651172799b6d4</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>CountRecords</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_29ec0a4f2fc22010fdd651172799b6d4</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-02-05 08:44:00</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
